title: Welcome Page UI - Create Free Account
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an Anonymous (a user that is not logged in)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects "Get MLB.TV" in the header
AND the Welcome screen is displayed
AND the [Create Free Account] button has focus
custom_expected:
THEN the background is a picture of baseball bats
AND near the upper left corner of the screen the MLB logo and "MLB" are displayed
AND below the MLB logo, left justified, a title displays "Let's Play Ball" (config driven)
AND below the title, left justified, a description displays "Choose how you'd like to explore MLB.TV today" (config driven)
(pending PS5TV-228)AND below that, "TODAY'S MLB.TV FREE GAME OF THE DAY" displays
(pending PS5TV-228)AND below that, a list of the day's Free Game of the Day is displayed
AND below that, the [Create Free Account] button, [Browse Subscriptions] button, [Explore Free Content] button are displayed vertically aligned and left justified
AND below the buttons, "Already have an account?" is displayed
AND below that, a "Log In" button is displayed
AND at the bottom left of the screen, "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more." is displayed (config driven)

title: Welcome Page UI - Browse Subscriptions
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an Anonymous (a user that is not logged in)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects "Get MLB.TV" in the header
AND the Welcome screen is displayed
AND the [Browse Subscriptions] button has focus
custom_expected:
THEN the background is a picture of stadium seats at the ballpark
AND near the upper left corner of the screen the MLB logo and "MLB" are displayed
AND below the MLB logo, left justified, a title displays "Let's Play Ball" (config driven)
AND below the title, left justified, a description displays "Choose how you'd like to explore MLB.TV today" (config driven)
AND below that, the [Create Free Account] button, [Browse Subscriptions] button, [Explore Free Content] button are displayed vertically aligned and left justified
AND below the buttons, "Already have an account?" is displayed
AND below that, a "Log In" button is displayed
AND at the bottom left of the screen, "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more." is displayed (config driven)

title: Welcome Page UI - Explore Free Content
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an Anonymous (a user that is not logged in)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects "Get MLB.TV" in the header
AND the Welcome screen is displayed
AND the [Explore Free Content] button has focus
custom_expected:
THEN the background is a stadium/MLB related image
AND near the upper left corner of the screen the MLB logo and "MLB" are displayed
AND below the MLB logo, left justified, a title displays "Let's Play Ball" (config driven)
AND below the title, left justified, a description displays "Choose how you'd like to explore MLB.TV today" (config driven)
AND below that, the [Create Free Account] button, [Browse Subscriptions] button, [Explore Free Content] button are displayed vertically aligned and left justified
AND below the buttons, "Already have an account?" is displayed
AND below that, a "Log In" button is displayed
AND at the bottom left of the screen, "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more." is displayed (config driven)

title: Welcome Page UI - Log In
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an Anonymous (a user that is not logged in)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects "Get MLB.TV" in the header
AND the Welcome screen is displayed
AND the [Log In] button has focus
custom_expected:
THEN the background is a baseball/MLB related image
AND near the upper left corner of the screen the MLB logo and "MLB" are displayed
AND below the MLB logo, left justified, a title displays "Let's Play Ball" (config driven)
AND below the title, left justified, a description displays "Choose how you'd like to explore MLB.TV today" (config driven)
AND below that, the [Create Free Account] button, [Browse Subscriptions] button, [Explore Free Content] button are displayed vertically aligned and left justified
AND below the buttons, "Already have an account?" is displayed
AND below that, a "Log In" button is displayed
AND at the bottom left of the screen, "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more." is displayed (config driven)

title: Create Account page UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is Anonymous (not logged in)
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_expected:
THEN the user lands on the Create Account page
AND the background is a picture of baseball bats
AND all the elements of the page are left justified on the screen
AND the MLB logo displays in the upper left of the screen
AND the text "MLB" displays directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND below that, the title displays "Create a free MLB account" (config driven)
AND below the title, the subtitle displays “Create your account today to watch the MLB.TV  Free Game of the Day and much, much more.” (config driven)
AND below the subtitle, the "Email Address" field is displayed
AND the "Email Address" field has focus
AND the "Email Address" field has a white background
AND the "Email Address" field contains the ghost text "Email Address"
AND below the "Email Address" field, the "Password" field displays
AND the "Password" field has a translucent background
AND the "Password" field has a white border
AND the "Password" field contains the ghost text "Password"
AND below that, an un-checked check box displays
AND to the right of the check box, the following white text displays, "I would like to receive commercial e-mails from MLB.com and their partners." (config driven)
AND below that, the [Create Account] button is displayed
AND the [Create Account] button has a grey background
AND the [Create Account] button contains the text "Create Account"
AND to the right of the [Create Account] button, the [Cancel] button is displayed
AND the [Cancel] button has a grey background
AND the [Cancel] button contains the text "Cancel"
AND at the bottom of the screen the white text "By clicking Create account, I accept and agree to the MLB.com Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. By watching MLB.TV Free Game of the Day, I agree to receive limited follow-up emails about MLB.TV." (config driven)

title: Log In page UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches the app
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the "Log In" page
custom_expected:
THEN the user lands on the Login page
AND the background is a blurred baseball related image

AND the MLB logo is displayed at the top left of the screen
AND "MLB" text is displayed directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND below that, in bold text, "Use This Device" is displayed
AND below that, the "Email Address" field displays with focus
AND the "Email Address" field contains grey ghost text "Email Address"
AND below that, the "Password" field is displayed with grey ghost text "Password"
AND to the right of the "Password" field, a button with an eye icon is displayed
AND below the "Password" field and view password button, a disabled [Sign In] button is displayed to the left of an enabled [Cancel] button
AND below the [Log In] and [Cancel] buttons, the following text is displayed at the bottom of the screen, "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Please visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more."
AND to the right of the text fields and buttons, two white vertical lines are displayed with "OR" separating them
AND to the right of the "OR" and vertical lines, "Express Sign In" is displayed as a title
AND "Scan the QR code or go to mlb.com/activate and enter the code." is displayed below "Express Sign In"
AND a QR code followed by an eight digit code is displayed below "Scan the QR code or go to mlb.com/activate and enter the code."

title: Have an MLB account Log In page UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user launches the app without saved data
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [Have an MLB account?] button on the Startup screen
custom_expected:
THEN the user lands on the Login page
AND the background image is related to the selected favorite team
AND all logos, text, text fields, and buttons are center justified
AND the MLB logo is displayed at the top of the screen
AND "MLB" text is displayed directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND below that, in bold text, "Log In to MLB" is displayed
AND below that, in regular text, "MLB.TV subscribers log in to access your subscription. Registered MLB users login to access the MLB.TV Free Game of the Day."
AND below that, the "Email Address" field displays with focus
AND the "Email Address" field background color is translucent white
AND the "Email Address" field contains light grey ghost text "Email Address"
AND below that, the "Password" field is displayed with light grey ghost text "Password"
AND to the right of the "Password" field, a button with an eye that has a diagonal line through it is displayed
AND below the "Password" field and eye button, a disabled [Log In] button is displayed to the left of an enabled [Cancel] button
AND below the [Log In] and [Cancel] buttons, the following text is displayed at the bottom of the screen, "Forgot your password? Please visit www.mlb.com/password"
AND below that text, the following text is displayed at the bottom of the screen, "Please visit mlb.com/tou for full Terms of Service"

title: Welcome Page - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launches the app without saved data
AND selects the [Get Started] button on the Startup screen
AND selects a favorite team on the Favorite Team page
AND selects the [Next] button on the Favorite Team page
custom_steps:
WHEN the Welcome screen displays
AND the user navigates to the [Create Free Account] button
AND the user navigates to the [Browse Subscriptions] button
AND the user navigates to the [Explore Free Content] button
AND the user navigates to the "LOG IN" link
custom_expected:
THEN as the [Create Free Account] button gains focus, it grows in size
AND as the the [Create Free Account] button gains focus, the button background turns grey
AND as the the [Create Free Account] button gains focus, the button text turns black
AND as the the [Create Free Account] button gains focus, the following text displays in the center of the screen left justified, "Create an MLB Account", "Watch the MLB.TV Free Game of the Day", "TODAY'S MLB.TV FREE GAME OF THE DAY"
AND as the the [Create Free Account] button loses focus, it returns to its original size with a translucent background with white text
AND as the [Browse Subscriptions] button gains focus, it grows in size
AND as the the [Browse Subscriptions] button gains focus, the button background turns grey
AND as the the [Browse Subscriptions] button gains focus, the button text turns black
AND as the the [Browse Subscriptions] button gains focus, the following text displays in the center of the screen left justified, "Browse Subscriptions", "Stream every game LIVE or on demand on you favorite supported devices with MLB.TV", "Start your free trial today"
AND as the the [Browse Subscriptions] button loses focus, it returns to its original size with a translucent background with white text
AND as the [Explore Free Content] button gains focus, it grows in size
AND as the the [Explore Free Content] button gains focus, the button background turns grey
AND as the the [Explore Free Content] button gains focus, the button text turns black
AND as the the [Explore Free Content] button gains focus, the following text displays in the center of the screen left justified, "Browse Free Content", "Explore the MLB app today. Check scores, watch game recaps, team news and more"
AND as the the [Explore Free Content] button loses focus, it returns to its original size with a translucent background with white text
AND as the "LOG IN" link gains focus, "LOG IN" is underlined

title: Create Free Account page navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Create Account page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the [Create account], [Cancel], [eye] buttons
AND the user navigates to the check box
AND the user navigates to the text fields
custom_expected:
THEN all buttons gain focus when navigated to
AND the check box gains focus when navigated to
AND the text fields gain focus when navigated to

title: Header navigation - Anonymous user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an anonymous user launches the app
AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Log In" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Log In" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Log In" to "Get MLB.tv" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Get MLB.tv" to "Log In" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Get MLB.tv" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Get MLB.tv" and vice versa

title: Header navigation - Free user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a free user is logged in
AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Get MLB.tv" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Upgrade MLB.TV" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Upgrade MLB.TV" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Upgrade MLB.TV" and vice versa

custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Single Team subscriber is logged in
AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Get MLB.tv" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Upgrade MLB.TV" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Upgrade MLB.TV" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Upgrade MLB.TV" and vice versa

GIVEN an AtBat/Audio Only subscriber is logged in

custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Get MLB.tv" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Upgrade MLB.TV" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Upgrade MLB.TV" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Upgrade MLB.TV" and vice versa

GIVEN a subscriber with MLBALL entitlement is logged in
AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Games" and vice versa

custom_preconds:
GIVEN a T-Mobile subscriber is logged in
AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Games" and vice versa

custom_preconds:
GIVEN an Xtra Innings subscriber is logged in
AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Games" and vice versa

AND one of the tabs in the header has focus
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates left and right in the header
custom_expected:
THEN focus moves from "Home" to "Games" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Games" to "Settings" and vice versa
AND focus moves from "Settings" to "Games" and vice versa

title: Header navigation - Get MLB.TV
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user launches the app to explore free content
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Get MLB.tv" in the header
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the Welcome page
AND pressing O/CIRCLE will navigate the user to the previous page

title: Header navigation - Upgrade MLB.TV
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user launches the app to explore free content
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Get MLB.tv" in the header
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the Subscriptions page
AND pressing O/CIRCLE will navigate the user to the previous page

title: Header navigation - Log In
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user launches the app to explore free content
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects "Log In" in the header
AND enters valid subscriber login details on the Log In page
custom_expected:
THEN the user is successfully logged in
AND the Log In page is dismissed
AND a loading screen with a spinning baseball image is displayed
AND the user is navigated to the page that was displayed when the user selected "Log In"

title: Header navigation - focus does not leave the page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has launched the app
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates through the header
AND navigates through the elements on the page
custom_expected: THEN focus does not leave the page

title: Log in - invalid email format
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has entered an incorrectly formatted email address (no @)
AND a user enters a valid format password
custom_expected: THEN the [Log In] button is not enabled

title: Log In - invalid password format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Log In page
AND a user has entered an MLB account email address
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters an invalid format password (lower case letters only)
AND a user selects the [Log In] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is not logged in
AND the following text displays in red below the password field, "The email address or password was incorrect. Please verify your login credentials and try again."
AND the email field has a red border
AND the password field has a red border

title: Log In - unsuccessful no account
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has entered a  non-MLB account email address
AND a user enters a valid format password
AND a user selects the [Log In] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is not logged in
AND the following text displays in red below the password field, "The email address or password was incorrect. Please verify your login credentials and try again."
AND the email field has a red border
AND the password field has a red border

title: Log In - unsuccessful wrong password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Log In page
AND a user has entered an MLB account email address
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters an incorrect account password
AND a user selects the [Log In] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is not logged in
AND the following text displays in red below the password field, "The email address or password was incorrect. Please verify your login credentials and try again."
AND the email field has a red border
AND the password field has a red border

title: Log In - Log In button enabled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user launches the app
AND a user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to the Log In page
AND a user enters a valid format email address in the "Email Address" field
AND a user enters one character in the "Password" field
custom_expected: THEN the [Log In] button is enabled

title: Log In from header - Cancel button functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the Log In tab in the header
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Cancel] button
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the previous page

title: Log In - Successful login paid user
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters an existing MLB.TV subscriber email address in the "Email Address" field
AND a user enters the existing subscriber password in the "Password" field
AND a user selects the [Log In] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is logged in successfully
AND a spinning baseball is displayed indicating the page is loading
AND the user is navigated to the previous page

title: Log In - Successful login free user
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user enters an existing free MLB account email address in the "Email Address" field
AND a user enters a valid password in the "Password" field
AND a user selects the [Log In] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is logged in successfully
AND a spinning baseball is displayed indicating the page is loading
AND the user is navigated to the previous page

title: Log In from header - back button on controller
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the Log In tab in the header
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the previous page

title: Log In from settings - Cancel button functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user navigates to the Settings page
AND the user selects the Log In on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Cancel] button
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the Settings page

title: Log In from settings - back button on controller
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user navigates to the Settings page
AND the user selects the Log In on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [O] button on the controller
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the Settings page

title: Log In - view password
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the eye button
AND enters characters into the Password field
custom_expected:
THEN a user is able to see the characters entered in the Password field
AND the eye button displays a slash through the eye

title: Log In - hide password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Log In page
AND the eye button has a slash through it
AND characters have been entered into the Password field
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the eye button
custom_expected:
THEN the characters entered in the Password field are changed to dots (•)
AND the eye button does not display a slash through the eye

title: Log In - QR Code Successful
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user already has an MLB Account
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Have An MLB.TV Account?" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scans the QR code on the screen with a mobile/tablet device
AND follows the instructions on the device
custom_expected: THEN the user is successfully logged into the app

title: Log In - QR Code Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user already has an MLB Account
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Have An MLB.TV Account?" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user scans the QR code on the screen with a mobile/tablet device
AND doesn't complete the login process within 10 minutes
custom_expected: THEN a login failed message is displayed on the mobile/tablet device

title: Log In - Activation Code Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user already has an MLB Account
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Have An MLB.TV Account?" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to mlb.com/activate
AND enters the activation code displayed in the app
AND follows the remaining steps on the website
custom_expected: THEN the user is successfully logged into the app

title: Log In - Activation Code Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user already has an MLB Account
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Have An MLB.TV Account?" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to mlb.com/activate
AND enters the activation code displayed in the app
AND doesn't complete the log in process within 10 minutes
custom_expected: THEN a login failed message is displayed on the web page for mlb.com/activate

title: Home page to Login to Home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Log In" tab in the navigation header
AND enters an email address and password of an existing subscriber
AND selects the "Log In" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the Home page
AND focus is assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the Hero (Home tab if "Watch Now" button is not present)

title: Games page to Login to Games page
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Log In" tab in the navigation header
AND enters an email address and password of an existing subscriber
AND selects the "Log In" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the Games page
AND focus is assigned to the "<" button above the furthest right game tile

title: Settings page to Login to Settings page
custom_preconds: GIVEN an anonymous user is on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Login" tab in the navigation header
AND enters an email address and password of an existing subscriber
AND selects the "Log In" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the Settings page
AND focus is assigned to the "Log Out" button

title: Triangle button doesn't move focus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on a page that does not contain a navigation header

**NOTE - Pages/modals that don't contain a navigation header:**
Log in, Create Account, Welcome, Subscriptions, Paywall, Feed Select modal, Secondary Feed Select modal
custom_steps:
WHEN focus is assigned to a selectable element
AND the user presses the TRIANGLE button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN focus remains on the currently focused element
AND focus does not leave the page

title: Express Log In Code Update - Stay on Log In page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user is on the Log In page
custom_steps: WHEN the user stays stagnate on the Log In page for at least 10 minutes
custom_expected:
THEN the activation code updates
AND the activation code updates in 10 minute intervals

title: Express Log In Code Update - Load Log In page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user loads the Log In page
AND the user does not log in
AND the user navigates away from the Log In page
AND the user navigates back to the Log In page
custom_expected: THEN the displayed activation code is different each time the Log In page is loaded

title: Express Log In Code Update - App background
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user is on the Log In page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user backgrounds the app over night
AND re-opens the app the next day
custom_expected: THEN the displayed activation code is updated

title: User stays logged in
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged into the app
custom_steps:
WHEN a user closes the app
OR the user puts the app to sleep
AND the user relaunches the app
custom_expected: THEN the user should still be logged in

title: Create Free MLB.TV account - Opt in/out emails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps: WHEN the user toggles the email opt-in/out check box
custom_expected:
THEN the check box gains focus
AND the check box background is translucent white
AND the check box border is white
AND a check mark appears/disappears in the check box

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters an invalid format email address in the "Email Address" field
AND a valid format password in the "Password" field
AND selects the [Create Account] button
custom_expected:
THEN the email address field has a red border
AND "Your e-mail address must be in the format of name@domain.com." is displayed between the email address field and password field

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Length
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a valid format email address in the "Email Address" field
AND the user enters an invalid password length in the "Password" field
AND selects the [Create Account] button
custom_expected:
THEN the password field has a red border
AND "Use 8-15 characters with one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number." displays directly below the password field

title: Create Account Failure - Invalid Password - Bad Format
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a valid format email address in the "Email Address" field
AND the user enters a valid password length with only lower-case letters in the "Password" field
OR the user enters a valid password length with only upper-case letters in the "Password" field
OR the user enters a valid password length with only numbers in the "Password" field
OR the user enters a valid password length with only lower-case letters and a number in the "Password" field
OR the user enters a valid password length with only upper-case letters and a number in the "Password" field
AND the user selects the [Create Account] button
custom_expected: THEN "Use 8-15 characters with one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number." displays directly below the password field

title: Create Account Failure - Existing Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters an existing MLB.TV subscriber email address in the "Email Address" field
AND the user enters a valid format password in the "Password" field
AND the user selects the [Create Account] button
custom_expected: THEN red text above the "Email Address" field displays stating, "An error occurred, please try again. •duplicate email address"

title: Create Account Failure - Existing email/password combination
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters an existing MLB.TV subscriber email address in the "Email Address" field
AND the user enters the password associated with the existing subscriber email address in the "Password" field
AND the user selects the [Create Account] button
custom_expected: THEN red text above the "Email Address" field displays stating, "An error occurred, please try again. •duplicate email address"

title: Create Free Account Cancel button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the [Cancel] button
OR the user presses the BACK button on the controller
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated back to the Welcome page

title: Create Free Account Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is not logged in
AND the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the header
AND the user selects the [Create Free Account] button on the Welcome page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a non-existing MLB.TV subscriber email address in the "Email Address" field
AND the user enters a valid format password in the "Password" field
AND the user selects the [Create Account] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to a page with a baseball bats background
AND the MLB logo/text is displayed center justified at the top of the screen
AND below that, a square diamond with a checkmark is displayed
AND below that, the following text is displayed "Your account was successfully created."
AND below that, a [Continue] button is displayed with focus
AND the user is navigated to the previous page with a navigation header after selecting the [Continue] button
AND "Upgrade MLB.TV" appears to the left of the Settings tab in the navigation header
AND "Log In" does not appear in the navigation header
AND the new user is successfully logged in

title: Create Account - view password
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Create Account page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the eye button
AND enters characters into the Password field
custom_expected:
THEN a user is able to see the characters entered in the Password field
AND the eye button displays a slash through the eye

title: Create Account - hide password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Create Account page
AND the eye button has a slash through it
AND characters have been entered into the Password field
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the eye button
custom_expected:
THEN the characters entered in the Password field are changed to dots (•)
AND the eye button does not display a slash through the eye

custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the navigation header
AND selects the "Create Free Account" button on the Welcome page
AND enters a valid email address and password
AND selects the "Create Account" button on the Create Free Account page
AND select the "Continue" button on the "Your account was successfully created." page

custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the "Get MLB.TV" tab in the navigation header

custom_expected:

title: Browse Subscriptions page UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Get MLB.TV/Welcome page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [Browse Subscriptions] button on the Welcome page
custom_expected:
THEN the user lands on the Subscriptions/Paywall page
AND the background is a generic baseball image
AND all the elements of the page are Left justified on the screen
AND the MLB logo displays at the top of the screen
AND the text "MLB" displays directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND below that, the white text "Choose your plan" displays (config driven)
AND below that, the white text "Stream MLB action, minor league games, and exclusive content" displays (config driven)
AND below that, a Yearly/Monthly toggle displays
AND below that, the available package tiles display in a carousel
AND no more than 3 package tiles are fully displayed in the carousel
IF more than 3 packages are returned from the service, the 4th package tile is peeking from the right side of the screen
AND the text "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/{platform} to learn more." displays left justified at the bottom of the screen (config driven)

**NOTE:** The displayed subscriptions are driven by the paywall config tool. It is possible to have less than three subscription options displaying. The contents of the tiles are also subject to the paywall config tool and may be different than what is mentioned in the test. The displayed subscription options will be left justified.

title: Paywall Subscription Package Carousel
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Paywall/Subscriptions page
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates through the subscription package carousel
custom_expected:
THEN focus is indicated by a white border around the package tile
AND if more than 3 subscription packages are returned from the service, the carousel scrolls to the left to focus on tiles 4 and above
AND as the carousel scrolls, the package tiles peek from either side of the screen
AND focus does not leave the carousel when the user attempts to navigate down

title: Subscription Package Tile - UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Paywall page
AND subscription packages have been returned from the Paywall Config
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a subscription package tile
custom_expected:
THEN the name of the SKU will be left justified at the top of the tile (an ellipse will display at the end of the SKU name if it's longer than 1 line)
AND "Free for 7 days, then <price> / <period>" is displayed below the name of the SKU (config driven)
AND a description of the SKU will appear at the bottom of the tile
AND if badging for the package is returned in the service, it will appear at the top of the tile with center justified text

**NOTE:** Badging color and text will be returned in the service

title: Subscription Purchase Page - UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Paywall page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a subscription package tile
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the purchase page for the selected package
AND the MLB log displays in the upper left corner of the screen
AND the selected package title displays in white text, left justified below the MLB logo
AND "<price>/<period>" displays in white text below the package title
AND the subtitle text reads "To purchase an MLB.TV subscription, visit mlb.com/ps5 or scan the QR Code to get started" in white text (config driven)
AND a button with text "Log In" is displayed below the subtitle
AND the log in button is white with black text, to indicate focus
AND a QR code is displayed on the right side of the screen

title: Subscription Purchase Page - QR Code
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the purchase page for a subscription package
custom_steps: WHEN the user scans the QR code on the screen with a mobile device
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the MLB Paywall on the mobile device

title: Subscription Purchase Page - Go Back
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Purchase page for a subscription package
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the BACK button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Paywall page
AND focus is assigned to the first tile in the carousel

title: Subscription Purchase Page - Log In Anonymous
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Purchase page for a subscription package
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Log In" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the Log In page
AND the user is able to successfully log in

title: Subscription Purchase Page - Log In non-Anonymous
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an AtBat, Single Team, or Free subscriber
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Purchase page for a subscription package
custom_expected: THEN the "Log In" button does not display

title: Buy Now Single Team Subscription UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Subscriptions/Paywall page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MLB.TV Single Team Package tile
AND the user selects the [Buy Now] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the purchase instructions page
AND the MLB logo displays at the top of the screen
AND the text "MLB" displays directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND the MLB logo with the "MLB" text is centered at the top of the screen
AND below that, the white text "Purchase an MLB.TV subscription to watch games LIVE or on demand." displays (this text is configurable)
AND below that, white text "MLB.TV Single team <price>" is displayed to the right of a check mark inside a translucent grey box
AND below that, diagonally left, a number list of instructions displays the following, "1. Visit mlb.com/ps5", "2. Select a package", "3. Log In or create an account", "4. Complete your purchase", "5. Return to your TV and log in" (text is configurable)
AND to the right of the list of instructions, a QR code displays
AND below the QR code the following white text displays "Scan to visit mlb.com/ps5" (text is configurable)
AND below the list of instructions and QR code a [Log In] button is displayed
AND the [Log In] button has focus
AND at the bottom of the screen the white text "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more."

title: Buy Now Monthly Subscription UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Subscriptions/Paywall page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MLB.TV Monthly Package tile
AND the user selects the [Buy Now] button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the purchase instructions page
AND the MLB logo displays at the top of the screen
AND the text "MLB" displays directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND the MLB logo with the "MLB" text is centered at the top of the screen
AND below that, the white text "Purchase an MLB.TV subscription to watch games LIVE or on demand." displays (this text is configurable)
AND below that, white text "MLB.TV Monthly Package <price>" is displayed to the right of a check mark inside a translucent grey box
AND below that, diagonally left, a number list of instructions displays the following, "1. Visit mlb.com/ps5", "2. Select a package", "3. Log In or create an account", "4. Complete your purchase", "5. Return to your TV and log in" (text is configurable)
AND to the right of the list of instructions, a QR code displays
AND below the QR code the following white text displays "Scan to visit mlb.com/ps5" (text is configurable)
AND below the list of instructions and QR code a [Log In] button is displayed
AND the [Log In] button has focus
AND at the bottom of the screen the white text "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more."

title: Buy Now Yearly Subscription UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Subscriptions/Paywall page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MLB.TV Yearly Package tile
AND the user selects the tile
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated to the purchase instructions page
AND the MLB logo displays at the top-left of the screen
AND the text "MLB" displays directly to the right of the MLB logo
AND below that, the white text "All Teams Yearly NOW $119.99/year" displays (this text is configurable)
AND below that, white text "To purchase an MLB.TV subscription, visit mlb.com/ps5 or scan the QR Code to get started" is displayed (this text is configurable)
AND on the right side of the screen, a QR code displays
AND below the text on the left side of the screen, a [Log In] button is displayed if a user is not already logged in
AND the [Log In] button has focus
AND at the bottom of the screen the white text "Blackout and other restrictions apply. Visit mlb.com/ps5 to learn more." (this is configurable)

title: Buy Now Yearly Subscription flow

custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the MLB.TV Yearly Package tile
AND the user selects the [Buy Now] button on the Subscriptions/Paywall page
AND the user selects the [Log In] button on the Purchase Instructions page
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the Log In page

custom_steps:

custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the Log In page

custom_steps:

AND the user selects the [Log In] button on the Purchase Instructions page
custom_expected: THEN the user is navigated to the Log In page

title: Subscription Package Tile - Large
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Paywall page
AND subscription packages have been returned from the Paywall Config
AND "large" is the size returned from the Paywall Config
AND at least 3 yearly and 3 monthly subscription packages are returned from the Paywall Config
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the packages on the Paywall page
custom_expected:
THEN only two full tiles are displayed on the page
AND a third tile is peaking from the right side of the screen
AND as the user navigates focus to the right, the tiles slide to the left

title: Subscription Package Tile - Medium
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Paywall page
AND subscription packages have been returned from the Paywall Config
AND "medium" is the size returned from the Paywall Config
AND at least 4 yearly and 4 monthly subscription packages are returned from the Paywall Config
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the packages on the Paywall page
custom_expected:
THEN only three full tiles are displayed on the page
AND a fourth tile is peaking from the right side of the screen
AND as the user navigates focus to the right, the carousel slide to the left

title: Subscription Package Tile - Small
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Paywall page
AND subscription packages have been returned from the Paywall Config
AND "small" is the size returned from the Paywall Config
AND at least 5 yearly and 5 monthly subscription packages are returned from the Paywall Config
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the packages on the Paywall page
custom_expected:
THEN only four full tiles are displayed on the page
AND a fifth tile is peaking from the right side of the screen
AND as the user navigates focus to the right, the tiles slide to the left

title: Yearly/Monthly Toggle
custom_preconds:
GIVEN at least 1 yearly subscription package is set up in the Paywall Config tool
AND at lease 1 monthly subscription package is set up in the Paywall Config tool
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the "Welcome" page by clicking "Get MLB.TV" in the header
AND the user selects the "Browse Subscriptions" button
custom_expected:
THEN a Yearly/Monthly toggle is displayed left justified above the left most tile
AND Yearly is displayed with a light gray button/pill background color
AND Monthly is displayed with a dark gray button/pill background color
AND focus is assigned to the left most tile
AND only Yearly packages are displayed
AND after toggling from Yearly to Monthly, only Monthly packages are displayed

title: Yearly/Monthly Toggle Save
custom_preconds:
GIVEN at least 1 yearly subscription package is set up in the Paywall Config tool
AND at lease 1 monthly subscription package is set up in the Paywall Config tool
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the "Welcome" page by clicking "Get MLB.TV" in the header
AND the user selects the "Browse Subscriptions" button
AND the user sets the Yearly/Monthly toggle to Yearly or Monthly
AND the user selects a subscription package tile
AND the user presses the BACK button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the Paywall page displays
AND the toggle is still set to what was toggled to before selecting the subscription package tile
AND focus is assigned to the left most tile

title: Yearly/Monthly Toggle Hidden
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is on the Paywall page
AND only one 'name' value is returned in the paywall config json
custom_expected:
THEN the Yearly/Monthly toggle is not displayed
AND package tiles are displayed

custom_steps:

GIVEN the user launches the app without saved data

custom_steps:

title: Startup Screen - UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is launching the app for the first time
OR, for testing purposes, the tester has selected the "Clear Browser Storage" button, within the Dev Settings on the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN the Startup Screen is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN the MLB logo and "MLB" are displayed in the upper left corner of the screen
AND "Welcome to the official streaming app of Major League Baseball" is displayed left justified below the MLB logo
AND a button with text "Getting Started" is displayed left justified, halfway down the screen
AND the Getting Started button is white with black text to indicate it has focus
AND a button with text "Have an MLB.TV Account?" is displayed left justified below the Getting Started button
AND the background image is an MLB related image

title: Startup Screen - Getting Started
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is launching the app for the first time
OR, for testing purposes, the tester has selected the "Clear Browser Storage" button, within the Dev Settings on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN the Startup Screen is displayed
AND the user selects the Getting Started button
custom_expected: THEN the Favorite Team page is displayed

title: Startup Screen - Have an Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is launching the app for the first time
OR, for testing purposes, the tester has selected the "Clear Browser Storage" button, within the Dev Settings on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN the Startup Screen is displayed
AND the user selects the "Have An MLB.TV Account" button
custom_expected:
THEN the Log In page is displayed
AND the user can log in successfully
AND the user lands on the Home page after log in

title: Startup Screen - After Log In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND the app has been closed
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app from a closed state
custom_expected:
THEN the Startup Screen doesn't display
AND the Home page displays

title: Startup Screen - After Log Out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a logged in user has logged out
AND the app has been closed
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app from a closed state
custom_expected:
THEN the Startup Screen doesn't display
AND the Home page displays

title: Favorite Team - Onboarding Next

AND the user has selected a favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Next" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Following Teams page
AND the selected favorite team tile displays the team's primary color with a gold star in the upper right corner of the tile
AND all other team tiles have a dark grey background without a gold star

title: Favorite Team - Onboarding Skip

AND the user has selected a favorite team
OR the user has not selected a favorite team

AND the user has not selected a team tile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Skip" button

GIVEN a user has selected the "Getting Started" button on the Startup Screen
AND the user has selected a favorite team
AND the user is on the Following Teams page
AND the user has or has not selected a team tile
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the BACK button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the user is taken back to the Favorite Team page
AND focus is on the selected favorite team tile
OR if no favorite team was not selected, focus is assigned to the top left most team tile (Arizona Diamondbacks)

title: Select favorite/follow (Next) New Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user does not have an MLB Account
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user selects the "Getting Started" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a favorite team
AND the user selects the "Next" button
AND the user selects at least 1 following team
AND the user selects the "Next" button
AND the user creates a new account
custom_expected: THEN the selected teams are saved to the new account profile

title: Select favorite/follow (Skip) New Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user does not have an MLB Account
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user selects the "Getting Started" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a favorite team
AND the user selects the "Skip" button
AND the user selects at least 1 following team
AND the user selects the "Skip" button
AND the user creates a new account
custom_expected: THEN no favorite or following teams are saved to the new account profile

title: Select favorite/follow (Skip) Existing Account w/ favorite/follow

GIVEN the user has an existing MLB Account
AND the existing MLB Account has saved favorite and following teams
AND the user is launching the app for the first time
AND the user selects the "Getting Started" button
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects a favorite team
AND the user selects the "Skip" button
AND the user selects at least 1 following team
AND the user selects the "Skip" button
AND the user logs in with their existing account
custom_expected: THEN the users existing favorite or following teams are not updated

AND fonts don't shift between different font styles

title: Failing calls at app launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the network calls to https://dpm.demdex.net are block

**NOTE:** This should be tested in Chrome using Dev Tools
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the app
custom_expected:

AND the app loads as expected
